context: During an investigation of possible ransomware activity, several file system changes were detected on the device, including the files `get-userprttoken.ps1`, `characterical.zip`, and `characterical.zip.lockbit`. These changes suggest potential ransomware activity due to the known malicious extensions. The suspected ransomware attack was linked to account with Name `dp5hn` and associated IP address `99.83.111.100`.
question: An alert also indicated possible lateral movement associated with this incident. Can you identify the IP address of the device where lateral movement was observed?
solution_steps: There is possible ransomware activity on the device with AadDeviceId `e5799261-6720-4297-961e-bd9ca4275033`.
Suspicious lateral movement was detected with a network event involving IP address `83.162.58.168`.
